RentalMenus.TitleDescription: Choose yer vessel to rent, ye scallywag!
RentalMenus.ReturnDescription: Return yer rented vessel with flag %s, matey.
RentalMenus.ReturnNoVehicle: Ye don't be havin' a rented ship to return, landlubber!
RentalMenus.ReturnToFar: Ye be too far from the dock to return it, savvy?
RentalMenus.PaperWorkItem: Ship papers from %s fer a %s with flag %s, given to %s, arrr!
RentalMenus.NoSpawn: No berths be clear, move 'em and try again, ye scurvy dog!
RentalMenus.NoMoney: Ye don't be havin' enough doubloons to rent this vessel, arrr!
